definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
to see what is right and act courageously (idiom, from Analects); to stand up bravely for the truth/acting heroically in a just cause
Yiwu county level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亞伯拉罕信神，這就算爲他的義。

sentences.english: But Israel, which followed after the law of righteousness, hath not attained to the law of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列人追求律法的義，反得不着律法的義。

sentences.english: But Israel, which followed after the law of righteousness, hath not attained to the law of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列人追求律法的義，反得不着律法的義。

sentences.english: It wouldn't make economic sense to do anything more.
sentences.chinese: 除了經濟上的意義外別無他義。

sentences.english: The negative in a set of color separations that represents photographically the portions of the copy that will print as black.
sentences.chinese: 中義一組分色片中將來是印黑色部份的那一張陰片。

sentences.english: Antinomianism is derived from two Greek words ("anti" and "nomos") that literally mean "against the law.
sentences.chinese: 反律法主義來源於兩個希臘詞語，義爲“反對律法”。

sentences.english: You can pre-define a range of names or set a daemon group-wide default.
sentences.chinese: 您可以預定義名稱的範圍或設置程序組範圍的默認值。

sentences.english: Many connotations are developed on the basis of this denotation in the mediaeval times.
sentences.chinese: 中古漢語時期，由此基本義產生出許多引申義。

sentences.english: Thus, he could have actually practiced the righteousness that God's law commanded of him.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他本來是可以行神的律法命令他所當行的義。

sentences.english: Seek first the Kingdom of God and His righteousness , and all these things shall be added to you !
sentences.chinese: 要先求他的國和他的義，這些東西都要加給你們了。

sentences.english: Chapter three is about "right" in Zuo Zhuan.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，關於《左傳》中“義”的表述和研究。

sentences.english: In so many loving accompanied by my life's been very meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 在恁地多喜好陪伴下我的生活過的很是成心義。

sentences.english: Finally, the article discusses the meaning resulting in the disposal of the source-type problem.
sentences.chinese: 最後，文章探討了致使義處置式的來源問題。

sentences.english: Perchloride of iron used to etch gravure cylinders. Alernative term: etchant .
sentences.chinese: 中義腐蝕凹版輥筒的高氯酸鐵。

sentences.english: For "the man who practices the righteousness which is based on law shall live by that righteousness."
sentences.chinese: 因爲“行本乎律法的義的人，就必靠着這個義活着。”

sentences.english: Abram believed the Lord , and he credited it to him as righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯蘭信耶和華，耶和華就以此爲他的義。
